comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: This picture was taken with the camera (facing west) located in front of Hércules Plaza and the building of former Hércules Cotton Mill, towards Hércules Oriente Avenue. At this point this avenue bifurcates into De los Fresnos Street and Hércules Oriente. Querétaro, Querétaro, México. NOT ZACATECAS. In lascronicasdelviejo.blogspot.mx/2011/06/rico-pasado.html you can see two panoramic views of this site
